title: OpenAPI spec generation with swag init
description: Run swag init --parseDependency --parseInternal to generate docs/docs.go, docs/swagger.json, docs/swagger.yaml. Verify Swagger UI works at /swagger/index.html.

title: Database layer: SQLite repository with CRUD operations
description: Create internal/db/db.go with Repository struct, New() (opens SQLite with WAL mode), Migrate() (CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS with CHECK constraints), CreateTodo, GetTodo, ListTodos (optional status filter), UpdateTodo (dynamic SET from pointer fields), DeleteTodo.

title: Server wiring & bootstrap in main.go
description: Create main.go with swaggo general API annotations, logger init, DB init, handler init, Chi router with middleware stack, healthz endpoint, swagger UI route, and graceful shutdown (SIGINT/SIGTERM with 10s drain timeout).

title: Logging setup: dual-output slog with rolling JSON files
description: Create internal/logger/logger.go with MultiHandler (slog.Handler), Config struct, and New() function. JSON output via slog.NewJSONHandler + lumberjack (50MB, 5 backups, 30 days). Pretty console via tint.NewHandler. Returns (*slog.Logger, io.Closer).

title: HTTP middleware: request logging, recovery, CORS
description: Create internal/middleware/logging.go with responseRecorder wrapper, RequestLogger (logs method/path/status/duration/request_id/remote_addr), Recovery (panic recovery with structured logging), CORS (permissive for local dev).

title: HTTP handlers with swaggo annotations
description: Create internal/handler/todo.go with TodoHandler struct, Routes() chi.Router, and 5 handler methods (ListTodos, CreateTodo, GetTodo, UpdateTodo, DeleteTodo). Each with full swaggo annotations for OpenAPI generation. Include respondJSON, respondError, parseID helpers.

title: Data model & types
description: Create internal/model/todo.go with Todo struct, Status enum (pending/in_progress/done), CreateTodoRequest, UpdateTodoRequest (pointer fields for partial updates), TodoListResponse, ErrorResponse. Include swaggo struct tags.

title: Project scaffolding: go.mod, .gitignore, directory structure
description: Initialize Go module (todo-service), create .gitignore (data/*.db*, logs/*.log*, todo-service binary), create data/.gitkeep and logs/.gitkeep directories

title: Taskfile.yml: build automation & jq log queries
description: Create Taskfile.yml with tasks: setup (go mod tidy, install swag, create dirs), build (swagger + go build), run, run:dev, swagger, clean, and 7 log query tasks (logs:all, logs:errors, logs:by-path, logs:by-status, logs:slow, logs:recent, logs:summary).
